titleStmt.title: The oaths of Irish papists no evidence against Protestants, or, A warning piece to jurors in a letter to a friend.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.
Philanglus.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: "Philanglus", which is a pseudonym for William Penn.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
